name: unassembled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not assembled (= put together from separate parts): They sell unassembled furniture that customers must put together when they get home. We serve this taco unassembled so that you can combine the elements just the way you like them.
More examplesFewer examplesThe beds are supplied unassembled with full instructions for simple and stress-free assembly.It is not known how many weapons have been made, but even unassembled parts could be dangerous.At the moment, the baby's nursery is a spare room with loads of unassembled things dumped on the floor.
